module.name: @MODULE_NAME@
module.author: Ben Wolfe
module.description:
This module provides tools to port formentry queue items from one server to another.
Requires the use of the formentry module.

privilege.name: Remote Form Entry Resolve Errors
privilege.description: Allows user to resolve discrepancies in remote form entry queue items that were uploaded and patients could not be found

privilege.name: Remote Form Entry Export
privilege.description: Allows the user to export and download all entries in the Form Entry queue on a remote site and upload them

privilege.name: Remote Form Entry Import
privilege.description: Allows the user to import/upload the zip file generated at the remote site that contains Form Entry queue items.

privilege.name: Remote Form Entry Edit Properties
privilege.description: Allows the user to change the remote form entry properties. (like which encounter types are initial, etc)

privilege.name: Remote Form Entry Receive Data
privilege.description: Allows the user to receive remote data on the central location.

privilege.name: Remote Form Entry Return To Remote
privilege.description: Allows the user to return the remote data from the central location.

globalProperty.description: Directory where the generated return data will be stored
Directory where the pending queue items will be stored
Directory where the acks to be returned to remote sites are stored
Directory where the outbound queue items will be stored

List of remote sites. It is a comma separated list of space separated groups. e.g.: "1,2,10,23" or "1 3 10, 4 5 7, 18, 21". (In the latter, locations 3 and 10 are sublocations of 1 and all encounters/obs are sent to that same location)

A PatientIdentifier.patientIdentifierTypeId of the type that is used to mark identifiers with invalid check digits. If this is non-empty and an patient's identifier comes in that is invalid, the type of that identifier will be changed to this type. If this is empty and an invalid identifier comes in, the patient will not be able to be saved to the database and will end up in the error queue.

globalProperty.defaultValue: obs, encounter, complex_obs, hl7_in_archive, hl7_in_queue, hl7_in_error, orders, order_type, drug_order, formentry_archive, formentry_error
globalProperty.description: This gp will contain a comma separated list of tables to ignore when creating the large sql file. Tables like obs and encounter are ignored because they are generated in other files. Other large tables that remote sites don't care about should be in here as well.
